detail.content: The Department of Radiology | Radiology                                      Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home            Print  Email               - A + A                                                                                                                                           The Department of Radiology                                                      For over one hundred years, The Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center has advanced the practice of radiology to serve the healthcare needs of patients and physicians. Today, we offer comprehensive and state-of-the-art imaging examinations and image-guided procedures to support NYU Langone Medical Center, a world-class patient-centered integrated academic medical center that is one of the nation’s premier centers for excellence in healthcare, biomedical research and medical education.                                                                         Research                        Our mission in the Department of Radiology at NYU Langone Medical Center is to transform the field of Radiology to improve the lives of people.       More               Education                            The NYU Langone Department of Radiology takes great pride in training and educating radiologists of all ages and experiences. Our main education goal is to help shape the future leaders of radiology.       More               For Healthcare Professionals                        The NYU Langone Department of Radiology continues to improve its services and imaging in order to better serve of referring physicians and patients.       More                                                                                                                                       NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

NYU Imaging Locations | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home About Us Locations            Print  Email               - A + A                                         About Us      Message from the Chairman   Leadership   Our Physicians     open/close   Our Team   Radiologist Spotlight   Employee Spotlight     open/close   Subspecialties  Abdominal Imaging   Breast Imaging   Cardiac Imaging   Emergency Radiology   Musculoskeletal Section   Neurointerventional Radiology   Neuroradiology   Nuclear Medicine   Pediatric Imaging   Thoracic Imaging   Vascular Interventional Radiology     Radiology News   NYU Langone Radiology Alumni                                                                      NYU Imaging Locations                                                        The NYU Langone Department of Radiology provides a comprehensive range of imaging and interventional services throughout Manhattan as well as Long Island, Queens, Brooklyn, and Westchester. Below is a list of our sites separated by borough. Please click on any link to get further information on the location, hours of operation, and services provided at each imaging center.      View a map of our locations     Manhattan:       NYU Langone Radiology - Faculty Practice Radiology [Kips Bay]       Tisch Hospital NYU Langone Radiology [Kips Bay]       NYU Langone Radiology at 22nd street [Gramercy Park]       NYU Langone Radiology at Center for Biomedical Imaging [Murray Hill]       Center for Musculoskeletal Care [Murray Hill]       Laura Perlmutter Center for Women’s Imaging [Murray Hill]       Perlmutter Cancer Center [Murray Hill]       NYU Langone Radiology at Trinity [Financial District]       NYU Langone Radiology - Gramercy Diagnostic Radiology [Gramercy Park]       Hospital for Joint Diseases [Gramercy Park]       Joan H. Tisch Center for Women’s Health [Upper East Side]     Long Island       NYU Langone Radiology - Next Generation Radiology [Great Neck]       NYU Langone Radiology - Next Generation Radiology [Port Jefferson]       Metropolitan Diagnostic Imaging [Garden City]     Queens       NYU Langone Radiology - Columbus Imaging [Rego Park]       NYU Langone Radiology - Queens Medical Imaging [Forest Hills]     Westchester       NYU Langone Orthopaedics at Westchester [White Plains]     Brooklyn       NYU Langone Radiology - Premier Imaging [Park Slope]     Staten Island       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY  [Outerbridge]       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY [Bard Avenue]       NYU Langone Regional Radiology – Staten Island NY [South]                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers

NYU Langone Radiology - Faculty Practice Radiology | Radiology                                     Skip to main content                      Patient Care       Faculty & Staff Directory       Events       Careers       Donate                                                                                                                                                                             Radiology                                                                                  Home   About Us   Patient Care   For Healthcare Professionals   Research   Education                                  Home About Us Locations NYU Langone Radiology - Faculty Practice Radiology            Print  Email               - A + A                                         About Us      Message from the Chairman   Leadership   Our Physicians     open/close   Our Team   Radiologist Spotlight   Employee Spotlight     open/close   Subspecialties  Abdominal Imaging   Breast Imaging   Cardiac Imaging   Emergency Radiology   Musculoskeletal Section   Neurointerventional Radiology   Neuroradiology   Nuclear Medicine   Pediatric Imaging   Thoracic Imaging   Vascular Interventional Radiology     Radiology News   NYU Langone Radiology Alumni                                                                      NYU Langone Radiology - Faculty Practice Radiology                                                         Introduction     The NYU Langone Radiology imaging center is located on the 2nd floor of the faculty practice building adjacent to Tisch hospital. Imaging services provided include CT, ultrasound, X-ray and fluoroscopy. For scheduling, please call (212) 263-8868.     530 First Avenue; NY, NY 10016   Radiology general information: (212) 263-8868   Scheduling: (212) 263-8868   Fax: (212) 263-2290     Hours/Days of Operation      X-ray: Monday through Friday: 7:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m.; Saturday: 8:00 a.m. - 1:00 p.m.      CT: Monday through Friday: 7:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m.; Saturday: 8:00 a.m. - 1:00 p.m.      Ultrasound: Monday through Friday: 7:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m.; Saturday: 8:30 a.m. - 1:00 p.m.     Directions      Subway: 4, 5, 6, 7 lines -> Grand Central station; 6 line -> 33rd and Park; F, M, N, R, Q, D & B lines -> 34th & 6th      Bus:   M15: Runs northbound on First Avenue and stops at 39th Street.  Runs southbound on Second Avenue and stops at 38th Street.     M34: Runs across town on 34th Street and stops in front of the main entrance to NYU Langone Medical Center.   M42: Runs across town on 42nd Street and stops at 41st Street and First Avenue       View Larger Map                                                                                                                   NYU Langone Medical Center       Student Login       Library                 Policies & Disclaimers
